name: Pending Payments By Salesman Report
query:
select  
 so.owner  as "Salesman::100",
 so.name as "Bill No:Link/Sales Order:80",
 so.transaction_date as "Date:Date:80",
 so.customer_name as "Customer:Link/Customer:120",
 so.grand_total as "Amount:Currency:120",
 so.advance_paid as "Payment:Currency:120",
so.grand_total - so.advance_paid as "Balance:Currency:120",
 so.company as "Company:Link/Company:"
from
 `tabSales Order` so
where 
 so.docstatus = 1 and so.status != "Closed" 
 and so.grand_total>so.advance_paid
order by so.name desc
